summary: Provides a comprehensive Stable Diffusion pipeline that incorporates Self‑Attention Guidance (SAG) to improve text‑to‑image generation. The module manages model loading, text encoding, latent diffusion steps, cross‑attention caching, optional safety checking, and integrates extensibility features such as LoRA, IP‑Adapter, and textual inversion.
business_intent: Enable developers and enterprises to deliver high‑quality AI‑generated imagery for creative, marketing, and design workflows, offering enhanced control and safety while supporting customizable model extensions.
